data.name: Make It In Time
data.detailed_description:
Alicia Hudson and 2 other crew members of the spaceship colony, have survived the crashed on the unknown planet.

After they find out that the planet is in trouble with it's core and also is in danger of exploding, they have to Make It In Time to act and fight to survive and find a way to get out of the dying planet.

Game Features :
  • Hack & Slash Style :
    Don't worry about you fight a small number of enemies, you won't find it here.. ðŸ™‚
  • Enemy Waves :
    Survive and eliminate all enemies in each wave. It may seem easy, but can you do it?.. ðŸ˜‰
  • Suit Your Playstyle :
    Either you prefer to give your enemies a volley of bullets from guns, bombard them with grenades and some explosives weapons, kick them with unarmed melee attacks, or use melee weapons to slice them, it's up to you.
  • Quick Combat Mode Change :
    Push a button and your combat mode change quickly and seamlessly. I prefer to control a main character who can quickly change combat modes in one button.
    Say good bye to slow sheathe / draw weapon and change weapon animations.
  • Unlimited Handgun Clips :
    It is boring and annoying at the same time when you find yourself run out of ammo and surrounded by enemies. To prevent that, the Unlimited Handgun Clips is yours from the start of the game. Remember, you still need to reload though.
  • New Guns and Melee Weapons :
    As the story progressed, in some points you will find new guns and melee weapons for sale at store. Just exchange it with your hard earned coins.
  • Leveling & Character Stat :
    Level up with enough EXP and get a bonus for your HP and a character stat increase.
  • More features may be added later.

We will really appreciate all suggestions and feedback from all of you for this game.

Thank you so much for your support.
-- Kruntazie Games --
